duties_responsibilities.duty: Develops, maintains, and improves assembly processes.
Evaluates process specifications and reviews process steps to reduce inefficiencies.
Collaborates with Quality Engineers on process improvement, monitoring tools, and corrective actions.
Drives production schedules and process related problems to closure.
Supports engineering and development labs with new product introduction.
Assists in the compliance of safety regulations and provides production ready documentation.
Leads team in making process and efficiency improvements.
Handles first calls in non-maintenance down issues and aids in implementing changes.
Monitors equipment performance and makes minor adjustments and repairs under supervision.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s Degree, vocational or technical training, or equivalent
